title: "Dutch AI Semiconductor Startup Axelera AI Launches With $12 Million Seed Round"
excerpt: "AI semiconductor startup Axelera AI announced today that it has successfully closed a seed investment round of $12 million. The round was led by emerging technologies leader Bitfury and joined by global nanoelectronics R&D center imec and deep-tech venture capital funds Innovation Industries and imec."
